properties.description: Gets or sets the deployment properties.

detailLevel.description: Gets or sets the debug detail level.

template.description: Gets or sets the template content. Use only one of Template or TemplateLink.

templateLink.description: Gets or sets the URI referencing the template. Use only one of Template or TemplateLink.

parameters.description: Deployment parameters. Use only one of Parameters or ParametersLink.

parametersLink.description: Gets or sets the URI referencing the parameters. Use only one of Parameters or ParametersLink.

mode.description: Gets or sets the deployment mode. Possible values include: 'Incremental', 'Complete'

debugSetting.description: Gets or sets the debug setting of the deployment.

contentVersion.description: If included it must match the ContentVersion in the template.

ParametersLink.description: Entity representing the reference to the deployment paramaters.

contentVersion.description: If included it must match the ContentVersion in the template.

TemplateLink.description: Entity representing the reference to the template.
